page.title: 02LIFE STYLES
page.content:
In the area around Dungworth there is both a cub and brownie pack.In the summer a youth club meets for a 7 to 11 age group and a 12 to 16 age group.
Most of the employment is in farming.A few as labourers but generally as a family or group of families working on their own or rented land and selling their livestock,crops or milk directly. A few of the inhabitants work in Sheffield or Stannington.
In this area there are no schools or colleges but there is a school just outside the area in Dungworth where younger children go. The number of pupils is 40. The nearest secondary school is in Bradfield.
